original_text: Some of them asked Paul to remain in Ephesus with them for a longer time. But he did not agree to stay.
korean_text: 여러 사람이 더 오래 있기를 청하되 허락하지 아니하고

sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 몇 사람이 바울에게 청했습니다

sentences.original_text: to remain in Ephesus with them
But he did not agree to stay
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 머무르는 것에 동의하지 않았습니다
